Rule.Name: Restrict Runtime Access to Sensitive Packages (Automated)
Rule.Chapter: Configure Tomcat Security Manager and Permissions
Rule.Section: Restrict Runtime Access to Sensitive Packages
Rule.NonCompliantComment: Runtime access to sensitive packages is not restricted, which may allow unauthorized code execution or manipulation of critical Java classes.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Restrict runtime access to sensitive packages.
Rule.Correction: sed -i '/grant codeBase "file:${catalina.home}\/webapps\/-"/a permission java.lang.RuntimePermission "accessClassInPackage.sun.*", "deny"; permission java.lang.RuntimePermission "accessClassInPackage.com.sun.*", "deny"; permission java.lang.RuntimePermission "accessClassInPackage.org.apache.catalina.*", "deny";' $CATALINA_HOME/policy/catalina.policy
